content: {"name": "The Salvation Army-Dodge City", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Contact Person: Captain Roberto Davilla", "email": "", "url": "https://centralusa.salvationarmy.org/dodgecity/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1500 East Water Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Dodge City", "state_province": "KS", "postal_code": "67801", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 37.7498573, "longitude": -100.014631}, "phones": [{"number": "(620) 225-4871", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "06:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "06:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "06:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "06:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "06:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}]}
